title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 362 - Combustion, Treatment, Transfer, and Collection Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 362 - Combustion, Treatment, Transfer, and Collection Facilities

State Regulations

Subpart 362-1 - Combustion Facilities and Treatment Facilities (§ 362-1.1 to 362-1.6)

Subpart 362-2 - Municipal Solid Waste Processing Facilities (§ 362-2.1 to 362-2.4)

Subpart 362-3 - Transfer Facilities (§ 362-3.1 to 362-3.6)

Subpart 362-4 - Household Hazardous Waste Collection Facilities and Events (§ 362-4.1 to 362-4.5)

Subpart 362-5 - Paint Collection Sites Collecting Postconsumer Architectural Paint Under a Department-Approved Postconsumer Paint Collection Program (§ 362-5.1 to 362-5.5)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 362

Amended

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law
§§ 1-0101, 3-0301, titles 3, 5, 7 and 8 of article 17, 19-0301,19-0303,19-0306, titles 1, 7 and 25 of article, title 1 of article 70, and titles 27, 35, and 40 of article 71. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
